name: Elca Solutions
tag_list: web-development, web-site-development, web-application-development, internet-application-development, web-based-applications, web-based-software
overview:
Elca Solutions develops large-scale, database-driven websites for businesses and government agencies.

Elca takes a disciplined approach to project management which keeps time-sensitive projects on track. At the onset of every new project, they aim to work closely with their clients to define comprehensive system specifications, detailed development timetables, and incentivized payment schedules.

Elca uses free and open-source technologies so that its clients can use its work, for any purpose, for an unlimited period of time without any recurring fees.

Elca Solutions also develops websites to be accessible to people with visual and memory impairments. They implement several coding and design strategies to accommodate people with disabilities, particularly those using assistance technologies such as screen readers.
